result.markdown: --- title: "Week 6: Functional programming" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## Main reference * [9-11. *Advanced R*](https://adv-r.hadley.nz/fp.html) ## What you will learn this week * Functions * Function arguments * Function factories ## Slides for week Download pdf ## Assignments * [Assignment 1](../assignments/A1.qmd) is due on Tuesday 31 March.
